QuestData.Title: A Deal With a Dragon
QuestData.Description: While we are circling around Dreadmaul Rock, there's one more stop that we need to make.$b$bYou remember the hatchlings that you freed from the Whelping Downs? Troteman's been hanging onto them, and we're going to deliver them to someone who will take care of them better than we can. He's staying in Slither Rock, to the northeast of Dreadmaul Rock.$b$bHis name is Acride, and he might be the key to victory in the upcoming battle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Rescued Whelplings to Acride at Slither Rock in Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, the whelplings. I will take care of them.$b$bAs for the agreement I made with your Colonel Troteman earlier, tell him that I will hold up my end of the bargain. You will have your dragon for the battle against the orcs.$b$bWe hold no particular love for the Redridge Mountains, but we do share your grudge against the Blackrock clan.
